Stabilize your crypto portfolio - Win Your Share of 75,000 EURC!
Join the EURC Giveaway Part 2 and stand a chance to win a share of the 75,000 EURC prize pool! Enter one or both competitions and get ready to win up to 10,100 EURC!

Calling all crypto enthusiasts and traders! You’ve asked for more and we’re delivering—for the second time this year.

Welcome to the EURC Giveaway Part 2 with a prize pool of 75,000 EURC. The new Giveaway will be live from August 8 to November 8, 2023.

Join the EURC Giveaway Part 2

Secure your chance to win up to 10,100 EURC! There are two ways to enter the Giveaway:

Buy & Win 100 EURC

  1. Enter the EURC Giveaway Part 2 via the banner in your dashboard on the web platform or in the Bitstamp Pro app
  2. Reach a balance of at least 1,000 EURC in your Bitstamp account during the Giveaway
  3. Be among the first 250 users to win!

Prize pool: 25,000 EURC

Trade & Win up to 10,000 EURC

  1. Enter the EURC Giveaway Part 2 via the banner in your dashboard on the web platform or in the Bitstamp Pro app
  2. Generate trading volume on EURC trading pairs:

EURC/EUR: Trade/Buy Euro Coin with Euro
EURC/USDC: Trade/Buy Euro Coin with USDC

The more you trade, the more you win!

Prize pool: 50,000 EURC

What’s more, you get an 80% trading fee discount on both EURC/EUR and EURC/USDC pairs over our standard fees (see our Fee Schedule for the rates).

To participate in either of the competitions, you need to have a retail Bitstamp account*. Note that winners of the previous Deposit, Buy & Win 100 EURC competition can't participate in the current Buy & Win 100 EURC competition. For more information, refer to the the Giveaway FAQ and Terms of Use (link below).

Residents of Singapore, the UK & USA are excluded from participation. Some other requirements may apply – check the EURC Giveaway Terms of Use for more details.
